General.Name: Namyong Terminal PCL
General.Description: Namyong Terminal Public Company Limited provides port, carriage, and handling of goods and warehouse services in Thailand. The company offers roll-on/roll-off terminal services for liners and automobile manufacturers to transport vehicles and general cargo at the A5 Terminal in Laem Chabang Port located in the Chonburi. It also provides parking space for preparing vehicles prior to export or after import; and office and equipment rental services, as well as vehicle cleaning services. The company was incorporated in 2012 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
